title: Rationally Speaking #205 - Michael Webb on "Are ideas getting harder to find?"
description: This episode features economist Michael Webb, who recently co-authored a paper titled "Are ideas getting harder to find?" It demonstrates that the number of researchers it takes to produce a technological innovation has gone up dramatically over time. Michael and Julia discuss various possible explanations for why this is happening, along with several challenges to his paper.

Michael and Julia discuss various possible explanations for why this is happening, along with several challenges to his paper.
